defs: = ಸಜ್ಜುಗೊಳ್ಳು.
to make ready; to prepare.
to provide (something) with.
to decorate; to embellish.
to become ready; to be prepared.
to be provided with; to be equipped with.
to be decorated, embellished.
= ಸಜ್ಜುಗೊಳಿಸು.
= ಸಜ್ಜುಗೊಳ್ಳು.
the millet Pennisetum typhoides ( = Holcus spicata, = Panicum spicatum) of Poaceae family.
its millet used as food; spiked millet, pearl millet.
a thing for sleeping or resting on; a piece of furniture consisting usu. of a bedstead, bedspring, mattress, and bedding; a bed.
a room with a bed, for sleeping in; a bed-room.
a corridor projecting forward, usu. almost open on three sides on the floor or floors above the ground floor.
a rigid support from below or side; a prop or buttress.
a small casket in which the linga (a solid image of Śiva) is kept and hung round the neck with a string or thread.
a horizontal architectural crosspiece, projecting outside, supporting the weight above an opening, as a window or a door; a lintel.
to cause to sleep.
= ಸಜ್ಜುಗೊಳಿಸು.
= ಸಜ್ಜೆಮನೆ.
a room where a person normally sleeps; a bed-room.
= ಸಜ್ಜೆಮನೆ.
a servant wose duty is to make ready the bed room (for his master).
the moon.
an armour worn on the body.
the unpolluted, unbiased intellectual vision or wisdom of a person (esp. a sage) that helps him realise the true nature of things, the right path or means, etc.; the eye of the spirit; the inner-eye.
a man having such a vision or wisdom.
lustrous; shining; bright.
bright light.
the long hair growing from the top or sides of the neck of certain animals, as the horse or lion; the mane.
long intertwined or matted hair.
anything that is carried; a load; a burden.
= ಸಟ್ಟುಗ1.
immediately; suddenly.
= ಸಟ್ಟುಗ1.
= ಸಟ್ಟಗ.
in a small degree; to a slight extent; only slightly; not much.
a folk-goddess, who is supposed to write the destiny on the forehead of a child on the sixth day of its birth.
name of a petty folk-goddess.
= ಸಟಗು.
= ಸಟಗು.
accompanied by, provided with a commentary or series of commentaries.
that which is accompanied by, provided with a commentary or series of commentaries.
= ಸಟಕ್ಕನೆ.
= ಸಟ್ಟಗ.
a false statement; a lie; falsehood.
ಸಟೆ ನುಡಿಯುವವನಿಗೆ ಮಠದ ಪೂಜೆ ಏಕೆ? saṭe nuḍiyuvavanige maṭhada pūje ēke? (prov.) falsehood and piety donot go together.
= ಸಟ1.
a man who habitually lies; a lier.
= ಸಟೆಗ.
a woman who habitually lies; a lier.
a false statement; a lie.
a kind of minor drama or dance.
the leguminous twining shrub Clitoria ternatea of Papilionaceae family with blue flowers, the root of which is used as a dieretic and demulcent; butterfly-pea.
the large tree Elaeocarpus tuberculatus of Tiliaceae family.
= ಸಟಕ್ಕನೆ.
the selling or buying of goods in relatively large quantities and usu. at lower prices than at retail; wholesale.
a hoarding of goods for selling at a time when the prices sore high.
to sell in relatively large quantities; to sell wholesale.
a wide, shallow earthenware.
a round earthenware with a constricted neck and a small mouth; a pot.

a long-handled, cuplike spoon for dipping out liquids; a ladle.
a long pole with a broad blade at one end, and used in pairs to row a boat; an oar.
(arch.) a unit of measure.

(fig.) to cook; to take up cooking as one's profesion.
= ಸಟ್ಟಾ.
= ಸಡಕು.
an ornamental tuft of hairs, feathers, etc. for decorating cattle, horse, etc.
a good road fit for the journey by vehicles.
energetic activity; stir; bustle; ferment.
the condition or quality of being turbulent; commotion or wild disorder; violent, irregular motion.
that which is good, auspicious or befitting.
beauty; charm; loveliness.
the state of being decorated.
a constructing or being constructed; construction.
to become excited, stirred; to be put into energetic activity.

= ಸಡಗರ - 1 & 2.
to be excited from joy, enthusiasm; to become zealous.
to look beautifully or lovely.
to construct; to form; to build.
to decorate; to ornament; to embellish.
energetic activity; ferment.
quickness; swiftness; speed.
to become excited, zealous; to be characterised by energetic activity; to act zealously.

unambiguously; directly; in a straightforward, frank manner.
immediately; quickly.
incessantly; continuously.
the potherb Anethum sowa of Apiaceae family.
the strong-scented shrub Ruta graveolens ( = R. angustifolia) of Rutaceae family, with yellow flowers and bitter-tasting leaves; garden rue.
shining brightly; lustrous.
the verbal condemnation; harshly or coarsely insulting language; a scolding; abuse.

a term used to express one's anger, disregard, slight, etc.

the quality or condition of being loose, not tight, taut or firm; slackness.
administration lacking proper control.
a slackening or being slackened; the slackened condition.
to cause or allow (something) to become loose, slack.
to untie; to unfasten; to unbound.
to cause to disperse, run away, in different direction; to dispel.
to leave (behind something).
to give discount, concession; to take lesser value than the face value or published price.
to become loose; to lack tightness, tautness or firmness.
(fig.) to withdraw oneself from facing a danger, undertaking an onerous task, etc.

(fig.) sexually immoral, unrestrained behaviour.
(fig.) the tendency to reveal secrets without exercising self-restraint.

= ಸಡಿಲಿಸು.
a loosened fist or grip.

A team pursuit game popular in the north of the Indian subcontinent in which the two teams alternately send a player into the opposing team's court to try to touch one of the opponents while repeating the word 'kabaddi' (to show that the breath is being held as the rules require); kabaddi.
a kind of plant.
a person who is or animal that is physically weak.

immediately; suddenly.
a man low in physical strength; a weakling.
a hindrance; an obstacle; an impediment.

a call to take part in a duel, contest, etc.; a challenge.
state or instance of being equal; equality; par.
a man as related to the husband of one's wife's sister.

the relation between the husbands of two sisters.

earnestness; sincerity.
the act of taking into consideration; a giving attention to; notice; observation; attention.

to lose earnestness, sincerity; to become insincere.

the quality of being mischeavous; mischievousness.

a man who is versed in the six vēdangas (a group of texts dealing with six subjects that are considered essential for an understanding of the vedas).

a kind of plant.

name of a deity, a son of the Sun-God.
(astrol.) one of the nine planets that rule the destiny of all beings; the Saturn.

(fig.) a perosn who persistently molests, annoys, vexes another or others.
the seventh day of the week; Saturday.
low or relatively low in height; not tall.
a man who is shorter than normal men.

fragile; easily damaged; frail; delicate.
very thin; lean.
of small or smaller size; small; little.
not noble in character or quality; dishonorable; base; mean; ignoble.
pleasing to hear; tuneful.
